title: Speech and language disorders
creator_credit: Queensland. Dept. of Education. Media Services
brief_description: A comprehensive introduction to the work of speech therapists. Looks at speech and language disorders in children, such as, poor communication and stuttering; and the problems adults face after strokes and throat cancers. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
